member.name: T:Cardinal.AspNetCore.Ocelot.Check
member.remarks:
Default way of validating method parameters is:
With the help of Check class, this is very easy. If it is possible, the validation methods return input value, so the parameter's value can be validated and assigned on one line:

member.name: T:Cardinal.AspNetCore.Ocelot.ReRouteOptions
member.summary: Ocelot ReRoute configuration.

member.name: P:Cardinal.AspNetCore.Ocelot.ReRouteOptions.SwaggerKey
member.summary: Swagger key. This key is used for generating swagger documentation for downstream services. The same key have to be in collection.

member.name: P:Cardinal.AspNetCore.Ocelot.ReRouteOptions.DownstreamPathTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the downstream path template.

member.name: P:Cardinal.AspNetCore.Ocelot.ReRouteOptions.UpstreamPathTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the upstream path template.

member.name: P:Cardinal.AspNetCore.Ocelot.ReRouteOptions.VirtualDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets the virtual directory, where is host service.

member.name: P:Cardinal.AspNetCore.Ocelot.ReRouteOptions.DownstreamPath
member.summary: Gets the downstream path.

member.name: P:Cardinal.AspNetCore.Ocelot.ReRouteOptions.UpstreamPath
member.summary: Gets the upstream path.

member.name: T:Cardinal.AspNetCore.Ocelot.SwaggerEndPointOptions
member.summary: Swagger endpoint configuration.

member.name: F:Cardinal.AspNetCore.Ocelot.SwaggerEndPointOptions.ConfigurationSectionName
member.summary: The configuration section name.

member.name: P:Cardinal.AspNetCore.Ocelot.SwaggerEndPointOptions.Key
member.summary: Swagger endpoint key, which have to corresponding with .

member.name: P:Cardinal.AspNetCore.Ocelot.SwaggerEndPointOptions.KeyToPath
member.summary: Gets the path from key.

member.name: P:Cardinal.AspNetCore.Ocelot.SwaggerEndPointOptions.Name
member.summary: End point name. This name is displayed in Swagger UI page.

member.name: P:Cardinal.AspNetCore.Ocelot.SwaggerEndPointOptions.Url
member.summary: Full url to downstream service swagger endpoint.

member.name: T:Cardinal.AspNetCore.Ocelot.SwaggerForOCelotUIOptions
member.summary: Configuration for Swagger UI.

member.name: P:Cardinal.AspNetCore.Ocelot.SwaggerForOCelotUIOptions.EndPointBasePath
member.summary: The end point base path. The final path to swagger endpoint is +

member.name: T:Cardinal.AspNetCore.Ocelot.OcelotSwaggerMiddleware
member.summary: Swagger for Ocelot middleware. This middleware generate swagger documentation from downstream services for SwaggerUI.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Cardinal.AspNetCore.Ocelot.OcelotSwaggerMiddleware.Invoke(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpContext)
member.summary: Invokes the specified context.

member.summary: Class which implement transformation downstream service swagger json into upstream format
